sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ModuleNotification from '../../../components/Widgets/Statistic/Notification'; import Slider from 'rc-slider'; import Tooltip from 'rc-tooltip'; const createSliderWithTooltip = Slider.createSliderWithTooltip; const Range = createSliderWithTooltip(Slider.Range); const Handle = Slider.Handle; const handle = (props) => { const { value, dragging, index, ...restProps } = props; return ( ); }; const marks = { '-10': '-10째C', 0: 0째C, 26: '26째C', 37: '37째C', 50: '50째C', 100: { style: { color: 'red', }, label: 100째C, }, }; const ControlledRangeDisableAcross = props => { const [value, setValue] = useState([20, 40, 60, 80]); const handleChange = (value) => { setValue(value); }; return ( ); } const AdvanceRangeSlider = () => { return ( Basic Slider Slider with fixed values Slider with marks, step=null Slider with marks, step Slider with marks, included=false Slider with marks, step, included=false Range with custom handle `${value}%`} /> Range with allowCross=false Range with step=20 Range with disabled Range with marks Range with marks, step Range with dots Range with controller, allowCross=false, pushable={'{5}'} Range with min={'{45}'}, max={'{115}'} Multi Range with trackStyle, handleStyle, railStyle Slider with className like square-handler, triangle-handler
Color Slider
Vertical Slider ); } export default AdvanceRangeSlider;
